website_summaries.verdict: Cole Haan ZEROGRAND Perforated Sneakers are a study in versatility. They have the elegance of wingtip shoes and the comfort of sneakers. They look dressy enough for work, yet casual enough for happy hour. And, they can be worn with or without socks. Put these kicks on your feet for light gym work, walking trips, office work, and any casual outing. They’re flexible enough for many types of activities, and the perforations help keep the feet cool.
pros: Cole Haan ZEROGRAND Perforated fashion sneakers have a comfort level “that’s off the charts,” many reviewers say
Plenty of people admire the classic, dressy style that you can wear anywhere
A lot of testers have mentioned that Cole Haan ZEROGRAND Perforated shoes feel very flexible and light
These kicks are versatile in function and looks, a good number of purchasers have noted
These low-tops from the Cole Haan brand provide a good fit, according to several people
Cole Haan ZEROGRAND Perforated training sneakers offer ample support, some individuals have reported
A few users have told of the compliments they keep receiving from friends whenever they wore these shoes
The colors of the sneakers have satisfied a handful of buyers
cons: Cole Haan ZEROGRAND Perforated trainers need to be broken in with a couple or so wears, several consumers have reported

customer_reviews.title: Great style with comfort.
customer_reviews.text: These Zerogrand Perforated fashion trainers are one of my favorite casual go to shoes and I wish Cole Haan made more of this particular shoe. I don’t wear them to train, I feel they are more than an athletic sneaker. I think they look great with leggings which I wear often... I wear them as a casual shoe to shop in or an afternoon at Starbucks. They are unbelievably comfortable and I get compliments on them all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Betty Jones

customer_reviews.title: I'm in Love
customer_reviews.text: I put them on two days ago and walked a lot that day, and the next day and not one area of stiffness of soreness. These shoes are very light weight and super comfortable! If I wear them this often i may need to get another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable fit for me.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this shoe, but it was too small and tight.Generally Cole Haan is a very comfortable shoe for me, but it wasn't the case for this design. I will continue to look for one that I love as much as the other pairs I have.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Ball

customer_reviews.title: Second Pair in a New Color - Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these on sale in PINK. Love them! They're perfect transitional weather styles for spring and fall. They are perforated, so air can get through, making them comfortable for less chilly weather. This brand are regularly somewhat narrow, but these do come in a "C" width, if that's a concern.
customer_reviews.author: S.L.H.

customer_reviews.title: the best! It is
customer_reviews.text: Comfort, the best! It is! The red of this series is also wearing The quality of cole haan is high.
customer_reviews.author: Crayon Shin-chan

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoes ever! Very slim and sleek so it doesn't look bulky like many running shoes I have. I am a small-framed woman and some sneakers look too wide and bulky on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Length good but heel little wide. The shoe is low cut and thin so my heel( which is narrow) slides up and down a bit. Hoping with warmer weather it won't. Definitely light weight and stylish as well as comfortable. Feels more like a casual shoe as opposed to an athletic shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Maria A.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and comfortable. Unfortunately, of the shoes had off centered balance point and my foot keeps sliding inward. It is a manufacturing defect.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Slutsky

customer_reviews.title: i had no blisters and they were comfortable to wear all day
customer_reviews.text: the toe area is narrow, but my feet are narrow so it fits my feet well. i was on my feet nonstop sightseeing for 12 days. i had no blisters and they were comfortable to wear all day.
customer_reviews.author: Cristen

customer_reviews.title: Excelente
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, Love Cole Hanns the comfort you can’t compre it.
customer_reviews.author: Bamboo

customer_reviews.title: Good ones!
customer_reviews.text: It fit as expected; I have a callus in my pinky and sometimes it rubs a little bit, but with a good pair of socks, problem solved!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Serrano

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable and supportive, and quite sleek-looking for walking shoes. I have not yet used them for the travel I anticipate in a few weeks, but I think these shoes are exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: SheilaG

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loved these shoes. They look great and feel perfect as per her reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Jason J

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sneakers. Fit perfectly. Love the style and color.. Very fashionable and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: lbfan

customer_reviews.title: Too wide for me
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very cute and comfortable, but they are too wide for my narrow feet. Unfortunately, I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Love them to the max
customer_reviews.text: My 3rd pair of zerogrand. Love them to the max!!! Light & comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Jeane

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable right out of the box. Great for walking and hanging out. Very stylish!! Can't wait to take them to Italy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the sleek look on the foot
customer_reviews.text: I wish they had a little more cushion and higher arch. I like the sleek look on the foot. I'm keeping.
customer_reviews.author: Mvj

customer_reviews.title: Love Cole Haan!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The only brand I buy and I am never disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan B. Theimer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable ⭐️
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for the perfect shoe for my European vacation that was gonna require LOTS of walking. I wanted A cute shoe but one comfortable and I found it!! I ended up wearing them every day ! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️🌟
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Love this Trainer
customer_reviews.text: Love this Trainer. I have gotten many compliments. Dress up causal dress down. Looks great with jeans and work/causal pants. True to size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ultra Comfortable Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I so love this shoes! They're ultra comfortable and fitted as expected. I am also so happy with Cole Haan's quality and style.
customer_reviews.author: Bel Enriquez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable, great fit! We will buy another pair in another color.
customer_reviews.author: Story

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are the most stylish and comfortable shoes. I love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like these- they may fit a little short- don't think I can wear socks with them
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Will see if they are confortable enough after I wear them again,
customer_reviews.author: Laura Rubio

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Cole Haan shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair that my wife gets, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Raul Negron

customer_reviews.title: It was good at rhe beginning but eventually it turned up changing ...
customer_reviews.text: It was good at rhe beginning but eventually it turned up changing the color! I was a cole haan lover but now I am so disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Reihaneh Amini

product_meta.title: Cole Haan Women's Zerogrand Perforated Trainer Fashion Sneaker
product_meta.description: Crafted in laser cut nubuck uppers that reduce weight and provide superior breathability, the light as a feather zero grand perforated trainer puts an of-the-moment athleisure spin on our traditional wing oxford. engineered for the foot's considerable demands, grand.os technology in the outsole is a thoroughly modern operating system designed to reduce weight, mimic your foot's natural flexibility and provide responsive cushioning throughout the course of your daily adventure. weather you pair with cotton joggers, leggings, or denim and a statement tee, this is a the true meaning of sport with style.
